title: env.default Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response confirming the default environment variable setting or deletion.

name.description: The name of the environment variable that was set or cleared.

text.description: The default value that was set for the environment variable, or omitted if the variable was cleared.

samples.title: Environment Variable Set Response
samples.description: Response confirming environment variable was set with a value.

samples.title: Empty Response
samples.description: Response when environment variable was cleared (no fields returned).

samples.title: Numeric Value Response
samples.description: Response confirming a numeric environment variable was set.
